column5: Learn to become an entrepreneur and develop your management skills. Graduate with the skills you need to launch a business or start your career in management.This course is for graduates with an undergraduate degree in any subject who want to develop an entrepreneurial mindset. You’ll learn the skills you need to pursue a range of entrepreneurial projects from start-up to corporate level.You will learn how to:
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
